nodes.text: The Tantra sector was a sector in the Metharian Nebula Territories of the Outer Rim. It was located near the Elrood sector and included the planet Tantra. The sector seceded from the Galactic Republic shortly before the Clone Wars together with the Elrood sector, the Danjar sector and the Sluis sector, effectively blocking the Rimward leg of the Rimma Trade Route from Republic shipping.
